channel.title: Intro on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Intro on A Hugo website

item.title: Introductory Post
item.description: After a bit of research and testing, I have decided to start using the blogdown package in R in order to continue blogging. With that change also comes the need to migrate my old blog from Google’s Blogger – that will be done over the summer and will probably a little bit of time since it’s not a straight forward process. I have updated the About page on this blog, as well as links that refer to my information.
